Summary: Going from west to east, Blurry Chevron looking object.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my back patio and out of the corner of my husbands eye saw a object so we stood up and we both saw a blurry object traveling way faster than a plane going from west to east making no sound. It traveled the length of our house in less than five seconds. A plane going from south west to north east followed about ten seconds behind it, it was going much slower than the object we saw.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Richmond, Indiana
This sighting has never been favorited.
